alert.note: Alert for Kent; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 1:59AM EDT until July 29 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following counties, Kent and Ottawa. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 158 AM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated 1 to 3 inches of rain in the last two hours. Additional rain amounts of a half inch or more are possible through 4am. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Grand Rapids, Wyoming, Kentwood, Walker, Grandville, Hudsonville, Jenison, Allendale, Grand Valley, Bauer and Cutlerville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
